item.title: go private package import and config
item.description: 常常忘記要怎麼設定 官方FAQ: https://go.dev/doc/faq#git_https 設定 ~/.netrc machine github.com login $USERNAME password $TOKEN 設定 ~/.gitconfig [url "ssh://git@github.com/"] insteadOf = https://github.com/
